revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Clara Lennox; or, the distressed widow. A novel. Founded on facts. Interspersed with an historical description of the Isle of Man / By Mrs. Lee...In two volumes......"
revision.text: Possibly: Clara Lennox; or, the distressed widow. A novel. Founded on facts. Interspersed with an historical description of the Isle of Man / By Mrs. Lee...In two volumes... (Harriet Lee). (London : Printed for the authoress, by J. Adlard, 1797). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1304842~S1
